Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System Cefepime (0.5-64 μg/mL) Gram-Negative ID/AST or AST
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Gram-positive bacteria isolates from pure culture
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System for in vitro susceptibility testing of bacteria using cefepime (0.5-64 μg/mL) in Gram-negative ID/AST or AST panels
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility (MIC) of most Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria and most Gram-positive bacteria isolates, including use of cefepime (0.5-64 μg/mL) with removal of limitations for Proteus species
